snippet: In a video, the commander of the Free Syrian Army said he was visiting President Bashar al-Assad’s home province to see the “accomplishments” of rebels, who have seized villages in the area.
abstract: Free Syrian Army commander Gen Salim Idris says in video that he is visiting Pres Bashar al-Assad's home province to see accomplishment of his forces, who have seized villages in the area; visit appears intended to show that the insurgent group, which had been overshadowed by gains of their tactical jihadist allies, were also involved in Latakia seizures as part of new front in country's civil war.
lead_paragraph: In a video, the commander of the Free Syrian Army said he was visiting President Bashar al-Assad’s home province to see the “accomplishments” of rebels, who have seized villages in the area.

headline.main: Rebel Chief in Syria Visits Assad’s Home Region
headline.print_headline: Rebel Chief In Syria Visits Home Region Of Assad

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
